mapper.select: select status from transaction_log where collection_id = #{collectionId} and project_id = #{projectId} and (t1.status = 1 or t1.status = 2 or t1.status = 3) order by gmt_modified desc limit 1
select * from transaction_log where registration_id = #{registrationId} and type = #{type} and status = 2

select distinct t.invoice_code, t.registration_id, t.amount, t.total_money, t.status, r.is_normal as project_status from transaction_log t, registration r where t.registration_id = #{registrationId} and t.type = "挂号费" and t.registration_id = r.id and t.total_money > 0 and t.is_frozen = 0

select distinct any_value(t.invoice_code) as invoice_code, any_value(t.registration_id) as registration_id, any_value(t.collection_id) as collection_id, any_value(t.project_id) as project_id, any_value(t.type) as type, any_value(t.status) as status, any_value(p.department_id) as department_id, any_value(p.status) as project_status, sum(t.total_money) as total_money from transaction_log t, ${tableName} p where t.collection_id = p.id and t.registration_id = #{registrationId} and t.project_id = p.project_id and t.total_money > 0 and t.status != 3 and t.is_frozen = 0 GROUP BY t.collection_id, t.project_id

select distinct t.invoice_code, t.registration_id, t.collection_id, t.project_id, t.type, t.amount, t.total_money, t.status, r.department_id as department_id, r.status as project_status, r.remain_amount as remain_amount from transaction_log t, recipe r where t.collection_id = r.id and t.registration_id = #{registrationId} and t.project_id = r.medicine_id and t.total_money > 0 and t.is_frozen = 0
select distinct t.* from transaction_log t where t.collection_id = #{collectionId} and t.project_id = #{projectId} and status = 1
mapper.update: update transaction_log set status = 3 where invoice_code = #{invoiceCode} and is_frozen = 0
mapper.select: select id from transaction_log t where t.invoice_code = #{invoiceCode} and t.collection_id = #{collectionId} and t.project_id = #{projectId}
select distinct invoice_code, status from transaction_log where registration_id = #{registrationId} and status != 1
mapper.update: update transaction_log set is_frozen = 1 where invoice_code = #{invoiceCode}
mapper.select: select min(gmt_create) from transaction_log where role_id = #{cashierId}

select invoice_code as invoiceCode, count(invoice_code) as totalInvoiceAmount, max(status) as status, SUM(total_money) as totalMoney, ANY_VALUE(type) as type, ANY_VALUE(pay_type) as payType, ANY_VALUE(registration_id) as registrationId, ANY_VALUE(p.name) as name from transaction_log t join patient p on t.patient_id = p.id where t.role_id = #{cashierId} and invoice_code <= #{invoiceCodeEnd} and invoice_code >= #{invoiceCodeBegin} and is_frozen = 1 group by invoice_code order by invoice_code

select r.department_name as departmentName, count(*) as visits from patient_case pc, role r where r.id = pc.role_id and pc.gmt_create <= #{endDateStr} and pc.gmt_create >= #{beginDateStr} group by r.department_name
